Attributes.description: Students will be introduced to the work of the major directors (e.g., Ozu, Mizoguchi, Kurosawa, Itami, Oshima, Shinoda). Ideological uses of literary texts and period pieces (e.g., Ugetsu, Life of Oharu, Double Suicide). Impact of depiction of Japanese in American film.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Wed, Start Time: 17:00, End Time: 21:00, Building: To, Room: Be
